keywords: ['hardcore hip-hop', 'male vocal', 'raspy voice', 'rapping', 'electronic drums', 'bass guitar', 'keyboard sample', 'hard-hitting', 'urban', 'violent']
caption: This is a hardcore hip-hop music piece. There is a male vocal with a raspy voice rapping at the forefront. The melody is made up of a repeated keyboard sample. There is a bass guitar playing a groovy bass line. The rhythmic background is composed of a hip-hop electronic drum beat. The atmosphere is hard-hitting. This piece could be the opening theme of a crime movie that takes place in the big city.
